SELECT [t2].[LanguagesId], [t2].[UsersId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[DateCreated], [t2].[DateModified], [t2].[EntityStatus], [t2].[Name], [t2].[RowId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[Id], [t].[Id] AS [Id0], [t0].[Id] AS [Id1]
    FROM [Artisans] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [u].[Id]
        FROM [Users] AS [u]
        WHERE [u].[IsSuspended] = CAST(0 AS bit)
    ) AS [t] ON [a].[UserId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT [i].[Id], [i].[UserId]
        FROM [Images] AS [i]
        WHERE [i].[EntityStatus] = 'Normal'
    ) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[UserId]
    WHERE [a].[EntityStatus] = 'Normal' AND [a].[UserId] = @__userId_0
) AS [t1]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [l].[LanguagesId], [l].[UsersId], [t3].[Id], [t3].[DateCreated], [t3].[DateModified], [t3].[EntityStatus], [t3].[Name], [t3].[RowId]
    FROM [LanguageUser] AS [l]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [l0].[Id], [l0].[DateCreated], [l0].[DateModified], [l0].[EntityStatus], [l0].[Name], [l0].[RowId]
        FROM [Languages] AS [l0]
        WHERE [l0].[EntityStatus] = 'Normal'
    ) AS [t3] ON [l].[LanguagesId] = [t3].[Id]
) AS [t2] ON [t1].[Id0] = [t2].[UsersId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1]

MessageTemplate: Failed executing DbCommand ({elapsed}ms) [Parameters=[{parameters}], CommandType='{commandType}', CommandTimeout='{commandTimeout}']{newLine}{commandText}

Properties.commandText:
SELECT [t2].[LanguagesId], [t2].[UsersId], [t2].[Id], [t2].[DateCreated], [t2].[DateModified], [t2].[EntityStatus], [t2].[Name], [t2].[RowId], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[Id], [t].[Id] AS [Id0], [t0].[Id] AS [Id1]
    FROM [Artisans] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [u].[Id]
        FROM [Users] AS [u]
        WHERE [u].[IsSuspended] = CAST(0 AS bit)
    ) AS [t] ON [a].[UserId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT [i].[Id], [i].[UserId]
        FROM [Images] AS [i]
        WHERE [i].[EntityStatus] = 'Normal'
    ) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[UserId]
    WHERE [a].[EntityStatus] = 'Normal' AND [a].[UserId] = @__userId_0
) AS [t1]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [l].[LanguagesId], [l].[UsersId], [t3].[Id], [t3].[DateCreated], [t3].[DateModified], [t3].[EntityStatus], [t3].[Name], [t3].[RowId]
    FROM [LanguageUser] AS [l]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [l0].[Id], [l0].[DateCreated], [l0].[DateModified], [l0].[EntityStatus], [l0].[Name], [l0].[RowId]
        FROM [Languages] AS [l0]
        WHERE [l0].[EntityStatus] = 'Normal'
    ) AS [t3] ON [l].[LanguagesId] = [t3].[Id]
) AS [t2] ON [t1].[Id0] = [t2].[UsersId]
ORDER BY [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [t1].[Id1]
